Added Inferno to beta tanks.

Regen changes: The time it takes to start regenerating has been lowered from 10 seconds to 3 seconds. The shield regen stat no longer buffs health. The shield regen stat is now far more effective at, well, what it is supposed to do Natural regeneration of health and shield are now far slower in general.
Lowered the amount of skill points from 45 to 42.

Did some changes to Summoner: The squares are now far more resistant to bullets. The squares now have their own slightly-more-accurate™️ AI, meaning they won't overshoot their target and they will be able to aim at multiple targets at once. Summoner is now square colored, rather than arena closer colored. Squares themselves are now smaller in general.
Buffed the reload of all bullet-based barrels in general by ~10% (Reload: 20 >>> 16)
